Articles.Content: I am using the Remote Tech mod and I am trying to build a communication system above Duna. I know that the best way to do this put a series of satellites into geosynchronous orbit. The problem with that is the geosynchronous orbit of Duna is inside the sphere of influence of Ike, so eventually my satellites get captured and the comm system breaks. And whenever I put a series of satellites into a non-geosynchronous orbit they will eventually drift apart and no longer provide coverage for Duna. ( I have tried using hyperedit. It works wonders for geosynchronous orbit but for anything else the velocities are not consistent enough keep the satellites in formation. ) Does anybody have any ideas that could help?
I tried building some sats with way more range than necessary, and put them well outside Ike's SOI. Worked out pretty well, but added a tad of time lag.

In order to assure that satellites don't drift too far relative to each other in their orbits, it is important that their semi-major-axis (SMA) match.

Same SMA means same orbital period.

Scott Manley said this in one of his videos.
